1341920.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #8
1341920.description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #8


Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures that are 5th edition compatible.
Check out
Mini-Dungeon Monthly on Fantasy Grounds and Steam as well!
Five adventures included!
The Dead Oasis An adventure for four to six characters of 2nd level by Thilo Graf
Cleansing Cultus Reanimus An adventure for three to five characters level 2nd - 3rd by Stephen Yeardley
Brush with Death at the Baevonian Stronghold A hold-the-fort siege adventure for four to six characters of 8th - 10th level by Jonathan G. Nelson
Umbravania: The Tower of Count Tolwynn An adventure for three to four characters of 9th - 11th level by Justin Andrew Mason
Long Forgotten, but Never Gone A hard adventure for three to five characters of 11th - 13th level by Stephen Yeardley
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Aaron Gentry
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
